ambiguities.source_text: Aggregate Value per Bike, Order Value and Quantity by Brand and Bike Type
Aggregate Order Value, Quantity and Days to Ship by Brand and Store to form:
Clean up the Model field to leave only the letters to represent the Brand
Calculate Days to ship by measuring the difference between when an order was placed and when it was shipped
ambiguities.ref: df['Days to Ship'] = (df['Shipping Date'] - df['Order Date']).dt.days

ambiguities.intent: Parse Order Date and Shipping Date using dd/mm/YYYY format.
